description: Get new size chat list. Now only support local shop to use new size chart.

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://open.admin.uat.shopee.io/api/v2/product/get_size_chart_detail?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&size_chart_id=700024639&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: size_chart_table
schema.description: new size chart is a table format which include multiple columns. each column has column header (measurement) and multiple values (measurement value) of this column.

schema.name: column_list
schema.description: column list of new size chart table. it include one column (measurement) and multiple values (measurement value)

schema.name: measurement
schema.description: this is the column header which means a kind of measurement

schema.name: input_type
schema.description: there are 3 kinds of measurement type: Single Dropdown, Input Single Number, Input Range Number.

schema.name: unit
schema.description: the unit of this size measurement.

schema.name: value
schema.description: if the input_type of measurement is single input number, measurement will have one value which is returned by this field.

schema.name: min_value
schema.description: if the input_type of measurement is input range number, measurement will be a range which is returned by 2 fields: min_value and max_value.

schema.name: max_value
schema.description: if the input_type of measurement is input range number, measurement will be a range which is returned by 2 fields: min_value and max_value.

schema.name: option
schema.description: if the input_type of measurement is single dropdown, measurement will have one value which is returned by this field.
